title: Manage Thickener Operation
description: A plant operator manages a thickener to separate water from tailings slurry.

tasks.description: Monitor the key parameters of the thickener: bed level, underflow density, and overflow clarity.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator confirms the thickener is operating normally.

tasks.description: Notice that the underflow density is decreasing, which is inefficient.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator correctly identifies the performance issue.

tasks.description: Increase the flocculant dosing rate to improve particle settling and increase the underflow density back to the target.
tasks.expected_outcome: The flocculant rate is adjusted, and the underflow density returns to its optimal level.
